---
title: "Define"
format: html
---

This will (correctly) show a missing `x` variable,
but we can test the `define` method by typing
into the console:

```js
let change = window._ojs.ojsInABox.define("x")
change(10);
```

At which point, the following expression should resolve to `50`.

```{observable}
x * 5
```
